responses: Hello!, how can I help you with your printer?

Please do a printhead cleaning by going into the maintence settings or similar. And then run a testprint to check, if you are satisfied.
Is there anything else I can do for you?

If you have a cable bound printer make sure the cable is properly connected, if it's a wifi model make sure you set up the wifi connection of the printer in the wifi settings, otherwise check your driver installation for more type "driver". 
Is there anything else I can do for you?

Please turn it on by pressing the power button. 
Is there anything else I can do for you?

Turn off the printer. Inspect the location or tray the printed paper ejects to. If the stuck paper is visible manually remove it. Remove all paper trays and any paper that may be stuck between the tray and the printer. Open the printer door that allows you access to the printer ink cartridges or toner and look for any stuck paper. 
Turn the printer back on. 
Is there anything else I can do for you?

patterns: how can I install my printer
my printer driver is not present
responses:
Thankfully a missing printer installation disk is not the end of the world and will not require you to wait until a new disk can be sent to you. Please go to www.itsolutions.de/drucker/driver and select your printer model and operating system i.e. Windows, MacOS, etc. 
Is there anything else I can do for you?
Ok! Then I wish you a nice day!
All right. Im happy to help you. Please write what's your problem with your printer?
